title: Sejuani Skin splash art
body: I own Poro Rider Sejuani, and I am a Sejuani main..... and my splash art doesn't show up!  It get the normal sej splash art, with the "Poro rider sejuanI" title below!  I know its a small thing... but I have finally confirmed its not just my local client seeing it.... so please fix!

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
